EmailTemplate.description: This email is for attendees and registrants of the 'Are you ready to go solo'? webinar held on January 27, 2012. Created by Whitney Downer, 1/26/12.
EmailTemplate.name: 27Jan12Web:AreYouReadyToGoSolo.27Jan12-ThankYou-AreYouReadyWebinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Registering for Our Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for registering for our "Are You Ready to Go Solo?" Webinar on Friday, January 27, 2012. We hope you found it informative. You can find a copy of the 30-minute presentation here, http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Webinar_ReadytoGoSolo.pdf. We have also created a document containing some frequently asked questions, key tips and other resources to help you determine if you are ready to go solo. View the document here - http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/ReadyToGoSolo_Resources.pdf.
As mentioned, this is just the first of a series of webinars MBO Partners will be hosting over the year. We invite you to join our mailing list to keep in touch regarding upcoming events.
Regards,
Sara Conde
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
